items.sentence: Do you have something that\'s good for a cough?
Do you think that this translation is accurate?
Tom was supposed to be here thirty minutes ago.
Tom was supposed to come into the office today.
Tom was sure that he would never see her again.
Tom was surprised that Mary complained so much.
Tom was the first one to get here this morning.
Tom said he\'d be willing to try anything once.
Tom said he\'d kill me if he ever saw me again.
Tom said he\'d rather not go to Boston with us.
